item.description:
We start @ 7pm. I open the door @ 6:45pm.
After 8pm is too late.

Tournament:
Buy in: $20 --- 2000T
Rebuys: $10 --- 2000T - Unlimited for the first hour.
Add-on: $20 --- 4000T - Done at the end of first hour.

15 minute rounds.
You can rebuy at any point you are 2000 or under.

Cash:
1/3 NL: (Min: 100 - Max: 500)

2) 50 100
3) 75 150
4) 100 200
